About me

Hey! I'm Nico, a mix between a financial and a tech geek. I'm full of ideas and energy to challenge the status quo.

I started this weeksite to show my work (I'm a freelancer) and write some stuff about crypto, startups and other projects.

Feel free to reach me!

Serious nico
